exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) p, q : list (Term A n) H1 : eqP A eqA n p q H2 : canonical A0 eqA ltM p H3 : canonical A0 eqA ltM q H4 : canonical A0 eqA ltM nil Unable to unify "canonical A0 eqA ltM p" with "eqP A eqA n (projsig1 (list (Term A n)) (fun a : list (Term A n) => plusP nil p a) (plusp (nil, p))) (projsig1 (list (Term A n)) (fun a : list (Term A n) => plusP nil q a) (plusp (nil, q)))".

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros p q r H1 H2 H3 H4.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) p, q : list (Term A n) a : Term A n r : list (Term A n) H1 : eqP A eqA n p q H2 : canonical A0 eqA ltM p H3 : canonical A0 eqA ltM q H4 : canonical A0 eqA ltM (a :: r) IHr : canonical A0 eqA ltM r -> eqP A eqA n (projsig1 (list (Term A n)) (fun a : list (Term A n) => plusP (fst (r, p)) (snd (r, p)) a) (plusp (r, p))) (projsig1 (list (Term A n)) (fun a : list (Term A n) => plusP (fst (r, q)) (snd (r, q)) a) (plusp (r, q))) Unable to unify "eqP A eqA n (projsig1 (list (Term A n)) (fun a : list (Term A n) => plusP (fst (r, p)) (snd (r, p)) a) (plusp (r, p))) (projsig1 (list (Term A n)) (fun a : list (Term A n) => plusP (fst (r, q)) (snd (r, q)) a) (plusp (r, q)))" with "eqP A eqA n (projsig1 (list (Term A n)) (fun a0 : list (Term A n) => plusP (a :: r) p a0) (plusp (a :: r, p))) (projsig1 (list (Term A n)) (fun a0 : list (Term A n) => plusP (a :: r) q a0) (plusp (a :: r, q)))".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Set
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall p q r : list (Term A n), eqP A eqA n p q -> canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> canonical A0 eqA ltM q -> canonical A0 eqA ltM r -> eqP A eqA n (pluspf r p) (pluspf r q)

```coq
intros p q r H1 H2 H3 H4.
unfold pluspf.
induction r.
- simpl. apply H2.
- simpl. apply IHr.
Qed.
Qed.```

original: intros p q r H1 H2 H3 H4. unfold pluspf. induction r. - simpl. apply H2. - simpl. apply IHr.
